name: 學生發展理論研究
goals: Building Foundational Knowledge. Students will gain an understanding of the basics of student development theory and its application in higher education
applying course material. Students will understand how student development theory affects student affairs on college campuses
Developing students' ability to think critically about student development issues
Students can develop a passion for tolerance and altruism through class discussion and reflection on student development issues
Building professionalism in student development and foster respect for differences and the pursuit of social justice in student affairs work
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
